attributes.action: make qigong available to the UK public on the NHS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Dragon Tiger Qigong is the oldest and most popular self-healing system known in the history of mankind. Currently over 70 million people worldwide practice qigong as a preventative healthcare measure. Funding qigong as an NHS preventative healthcare treatment will not only prevent illness but also reduce NHS costs and free up scarce NHS resources. It will also empower people in that they will be able to take responsibility for their own healthcare.
